name: Spark PR
description:
Since 1999, Spark has emerged as one of the most respected public relations and integrated marketing agencies in the world. Headquartered in Silicon Valley, we’re driven by our entrepreneurial spirit, a love of technology and an agile approach to developing our clients’ narratives.
We are proud to have established a world-class team with deep subject matter expertise, diverse skill sets and the hands-on experience required to deliver the results you need.
